ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc89:2.2_0: After putting out his sitting mat in front of the Buddha, he stretched it on all sides before sitting down.

ai-pli-tv-bu-vb-pc89:2.8_0: “Monks, I allow a border of one handspan for the sitting mat.
